ygData.subject: The Newest Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: This may be a repeat, but It came back to me with a failure notice. Brian, I noticed the patch only implemented a few spells in the Lifetap series... why the
ygData.messageBody:
This may be a repeat, but It came back to me with a failure notice.

Brian,
I noticed the patch only implemented a few spells in the Lifetap series... why
the huge gap between level 15 and level 30 for the next Lifetap upgrade?


With that said, I for one am very happy with the change in spells Verant made
today. I finally have a way to heal myself in combat, even if it is only for a
few points.
I have come very close to death many times while solo and this change is very
welcome.

--
Anekar "Cronik" Khaos <Dark Omen>
16th Season Troll SK
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
Bertoxxulous
